revision.text:
'''Hoenn''' is the third [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 138 Pokémon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating level 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. '''Hoenn''' is the third [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 138 Pokémon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating level 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. '''Hoenn''' is the third [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 138 Pokémon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating level 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]].
